node.statement: VERIFICATION REPORT (verifier-13): The repaired proof in node 1.6.1.6 correctly establishes the well-definedness of smeared Wick powers under the Phi^4_3 measure mu. All three errors from the original proof (identified in node 1.6.1.5) are properly fixed: (1) Duality condition: Now correctly uses s_1+s_2>0 (equivalently alpha>beta in C^alpha x C^{-beta} notation). Embedding psi in C^{3/2+2delta} paired with :phi^3: in C^{-3/2-delta} gives regularity sum delta>0. (2) Borderline bound: Now uses ||psi||_{C^{k/2+2delta}} giving regularity sum delta>0, strictly above the borderline. (3) Besov inclusion: Replaced by direct parameter choice delta_0=delta/3, yielding C^{-3/2-3(delta/3)}=C^{-3/2-delta}. No wrong inclusion needed. No new mathematical errors found. Minor note: Step 2 informally identifies static Besov regularity with regularity structures homogeneity from the dynamic theory; this is imprecise but the final regularity indices are correct. VERDICT: VERIFIED.
